library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)

IOW <- paste(sep = "<br/>",
  "<b><a href='https://www.io-warnemuende.de/en_index.html'>Leibniz Institute for Baltic Sea Research (IOW)</a></b>",
  "Seestra√üe 15",
  "18119 Rostock, Germany"
)

CEN <- paste(sep = "<br/>",
  "<b><a href='https://www.ifm.uni-hamburg.de/en.html'>Institute of Oceanography (IfM)</a></b>",
  "Bundesstr. 53",
  "20146 Hamburg, Germany"
)

places <- tibble(lat = c(54.179899, 53.567899), lon=c(12.081038, 9.975583), label=c(IOW, CEN))

places %>% 
  leaflet() %>%
  setView(lng = 11, lat = 53.8, zoom = 8) %>% 
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addPopups(lng=  ~lon, lat= ~lat, ~label,
    options = popupOptions(closeButton = FALSE)
  ) %>% 
  addMiniMap()
